participant_1.name: Max
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Max enjoys the thrill of skateboarding and the camaraderie of his friends.
participant_1.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Social and driven, Emily balances her work-from-home life with a passion for fitness and luxury cars.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
